page.title: 14Attitudes in Brafferton
page.content:
On the whole people enjoy living in the area - indeed Brafferton village itself is a very desirable place as it is in easy commuting range of Darlington and Newton Aycliffe. People like the peace and privacy that the village life gives as well as the surprising degree of isolation on the farms.
However there is a ceratin amount of inconvenience from the fact that there is no{shop}in the area though a travelling shop does visit the village.
Some people do feel that there is not enough for{young people}to do in the area and instead they have to go to Darlington for entertainment. But without their own transport many do find village life boring.
